ActJudges Act
SubjectHon. Marsha C. Erb ** RESIGNATION AND ANNUITY **
PrecisResignation and granting of an ANNUITY to the Hon. MARSHA C. ERB, a Judge of the Court of Queen's Bench of Alberta, effective August 31, 2017.
